comment.author: 54192430@N04
comment._content: There is a danger that title of this image could lead to the location being wrongly confused with 'Wells' in the County of Somerset. The location is more correctly 'Malvern Wells', a location much further north in Worcestershire, in the Malvern Hills. There is no such place as 'Wells, Malvern, England'. So just to recap for clarity, this picture is of a place called Malvern Wells, Worcestershire, England.

comment.author: 8623220@N02
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/david_allan/]  Thanks!  The gold letters printed on bottom of the picture agree with you; it says "Malvern Wells." I updated the title to match the picture's original caption, but will leave the supplied country name for "England" in the title, too.   Best, Helena (LOC)
